content.rendered:
Insurance

Insurance

Unlocking the potential of insurance through technology

Leveraging our rich technical & domain expertise and competitive cost advantages, NeST works with Insurance solution platform providers and technology companies.

We deliver Digital solutions, Product implementation, development, maintenance, migration and sustenance services relating to Core Insurance Administration products, applications, compliance, automated back-office operations and enhanced customer experience.

Offerings

AUTOMATION & CODE GENERATION Automated testing services using various products like Selenium, Microsoft Test Manager etc and RPA using UIPath. Automated data transformation and code generation solutions using Altova Mapforce, and Informatica. POLICY ADMINISTRATION, CLAIMS AND BILLING We specialize in implementing advanced insurance technology solutions for Property and Casualty Insurance businesses. With expertise in multiple Policy Administration platforms, we have successfully implemented various Lines of Business for US states, including Home Owners, Personal Auto, Commercial Property, and more.

Our proficiency extends to Property & Casualty Claims processing and Billing/Payment Solutions. As an authorized partner of Verisk, we integrate ISO Electronic Rating Content seamlessly, ensuring accurate and efficient ratings for your insurance products. Trust us for comprehensive insurance technology solutions tailored to your specific needs. ANALYSIS OF INSURANCE MANUALS AND RATING We are into Commercial and Personal Lines Manual Analysis, Support and Development. Apart from this, we also specialize in ISO rating content implementation and integration with all leading Policy Admin platforms for supported lines of business in all US states. FORMS DESIGN, COMPOSITION & PRINT Developed complex forms handling Solutions and Content Development, along with Printing systems, for all major US states and major lines of business for customers INSURTECH PLATFORMS Integration Accelerators Development for Policy Administration and Claims Processing solutions with third-party platforms for property estimation, loss cost calculations, address validation and any other software needed for LOB implementations. Integration with many payment gateway providers is also done as part of our services. INSURANCE DATA ANALYTICS & ÀCORD Insurance Product/Systems Development, customizations, feature additions and business process re-engineering services are developed for Insurtech partners on local and cloud platforms. ACORD XML based mapping, transformations and integration are also done as part of our services.

Success Stories

NeST Digital’s Solution Reduces Development Timelines and Time to Market for P&C Insurance Provider

Reducing Costs and Enhancing Support Quality: NeST Digital’s Offshore Development Centre Solution for a P&C Insurance Technology Company
